radiographic_examinations.findings: Pneumonia in the right lower and middle lobes.
Opacities in the right middle and lower lobes and a right-sided pleural effusion; the left lung was clear.
Bilateral pleural effusions larger on the right side, consolidation within the lateral segment of the right middle lobe, and patchy areas of air-space disease in the left lower and right upper lobes.

radiographic_examinations.date: Early hours of the second hospital day
radiographic_examinations.findings: Markedly limited by severe motion artifact; no abnormal extra-axial fluid collection or mass detected.
